Resource.Name: Meridian Basalt Nodes
Resource.Description: [RESOURCE]Meridian Basalt Nodes[/RESOURCE] Hexagonal basalt nodules saturated with steady qi currents; settlers hammer them into new foundations to anchor city grids.

Resource.Name: Glowmoss Cartographer
Resource.Description: [RESOURCE]Glowmoss Cartographer[/RESOURCE] Bioluminescent moss that maps ley-line contours as it creeps, giving survey crews a living topographical guide.

Resource.Name: Amberfen Spice Resin
Resource.Description: [RESOURCE]Amberfen Spice Resin[/RESOURCE] A fragrant resin tapped from amber marsh reeds; caravans prize it for elevating everything from noodles to nebula tea.

Resource.Name: Stargrazer Jerky Strips
Resource.Description: [RESOURCE]Stargrazer Jerky Strips[/RESOURCE] Slow-dried slices of migratory stargrazer flank that keep traders lingering—and spending—at frontier waystations.

Resource.Name: Astralseed Millet
Resource.Description: [RESOURCE]Astralseed Millet[/RESOURCE] Millet raised in low-gravity paddies so each grain hums with astral vitality, strengthening young families.

Resource.Name: Shellfoam Broth Clams
Resource.Description: [RESOURCE]Shellfoam Broth Clams[/RESOURCE] Foam-shelled clams gathered from dao reefs; their broth restores exhausted settlers after long shifts.

Resource.Name: Lanternfruit Citrus
Resource.Description: [RESOURCE]Lanternfruit Citrus[/RESOURCE] Citrus gourds that glow like lanterns and brighten communal feasts during protracted frontier nights.

Resource.Name: Songmist Bloom Petals
Resource.Description: [RESOURCE]Songmist Bloom Petals[/RESOURCE] Petals that release chime-soft vapor when steeped, smoothing tempers in even the busiest quarter.

Resource.Name: Skywhorl Ray Fins
Resource.Description: [RESOURCE]Skywhorl Ray Fins[/RESOURCE] Shed fins from skywhorl rays, bonded to hull canards to let cutters tack cleanly through grav eddies.

Resource.Name: Ironpaw Tusk Fibers
Resource.Description: [RESOURCE]Ironpaw Tusk Fibers[/RESOURCE] Resilient fibers teased from ironpaw boar tusks; drill sages weave them into wraps that hasten recovery and inspire new formations.

Resource.Name: Skyforge Anchorite
Resource.Description: [RESOURCE]Skyforge Anchorite[/RESOURCE] High-altitude ore that crystallizes along turbine cliffs and locks aerial platforms into precise alignments.

Resource.Name: Leyburrow Heartwoods
Resource.Description: [RESOURCE]Leyburrow Heartwoods[/RESOURCE] Heartwood roots that tunnel along ley-rivers, knitting entire districts against seismic shocks.

Resource.Name: Meimei's Pork Buns
Resource.Description: [RESOURCE]Meimei's Pork Buns[/RESOURCE] Beloved buns stuffed with lotus-fed pork; gourmet pilgrims queue for hours and flood nearby stalls with coin.

Resource.Name: Sunbraid Pepper Pods
Resource.Description: [RESOURCE]Sunbraid Pepper Pods[/RESOURCE] Slender peppers ripened in braided sun nets whose aroma alone sparks bidding wars between spice guilds.

Resource.Name: Moonquill Kelp Spores
Resource.Description: [RESOURCE]Moonquill Kelp Spores[/RESOURCE] Drifting kelp spores that settle in nursery pools and quicken infant qi circulation.

Resource.Name: Glaciant Marrow Pearls
Resource.Description: [RESOURCE]Glaciant Marrow Pearls[/RESOURCE] Frost-born marrow pearls dissolved into restorative tonics that harden constitutions against brutal climates.

Resource.Name: Festival Thunder Plums
Resource.Description: [RESOURCE]Festival Thunder Plums[/RESOURCE] Plums that crackle with celebratory thunder qi when peeled, igniting laughter across auditing halls.

Resource.Name: Cloudrest Velvetdown
Resource.Description: [RESOURCE]Cloudrest Velvetdown[/RESOURCE] Down shed by cloud yaks; plush cushions stuffed with it cradle exhausted clerks in weightless comfort.

Resource.Name: Starstream Rudder Coral
Resource.Description: [RESOURCE]Starstream Rudder Coral[/RESOURCE] Coral branches that grow along nebula currents; ground to slurry they coat thrusters for sharper acceleration.

Resource.Name: Thunderhorn Vanguard Spurs
Resource.Description: [RESOURCE]Thunderhorn Vanguard Spurs[/RESOURCE] Electrified spurs harvested from thunderhorn beasts empower shock troops while weapon scholars reverse-engineer the charge.

Resource.Name: Heavenforge Quartz Veins
Resource.Description: [RESOURCE]Heavenforge Quartz Veins[/RESOURCE] Prismatic quartz seams that resonate structural fields, letting architects suspend sprawling terraces with confidence.

Resource.Name: Terrashift Magnetite
Resource.Description: [RESOURCE]Terrashift Magnetite[/RESOURCE] Magnetized ore drawn from tectonic shear zones that keeps orbital shipyards balanced atop lift platforms.

Resource.Name: Dragoncloud Tea Sprigs
Resource.Description: [RESOURCE]Dragoncloud Tea Sprigs[/RESOURCE] Tea sprigs nurtured in dragoncloud fog whose brewed steam fetches fortunes at celestial auctions.

Resource.Name: Starbrine Salt Lattices
Resource.Description: [RESOURCE]Starbrine Salt Lattices[/RESOURCE] Crystalline lattices formed by evaporating comet tides, a culinary marvel chefs chase across the quadrant.

Resource.Name: Auroral Nectar Gourds
Resource.Description: [RESOURCE]Auroral Nectar Gourds[/RESOURCE] Gourds that absorb auroral light and distill into prenatal tonics for families taming harsh moons.

Resource.Name: Warmspire Broodfish
Resource.Description: [RESOURCE]Warmspire Broodfish[/RESOURCE] River fish raised in steam vents whose roe accelerates recovery throughout mining towns.

Resource.Name: Serenity Cloud Lotus
Resource.Description: [RESOURCE]Serenity Cloud Lotus[/RESOURCE] Lotus blooms suspended in perpetual mist that, when steeped, calm entire administrative wards.

Resource.Name: Joyflare Lychee
Resource.Description: [RESOURCE]Joyflare Lychee[/RESOURCE] Iridescent lychee bursting with laughter qi that dissolves unrest faster than proclamations.

Resource.Name: Voidwing Spine Feathers
Resource.Description: [RESOURCE]Voidwing Spine Feathers[/RESOURCE] Midnight feathers molted by voidwings and forged into targeting vanes that stretch beam arcs across battles.

Resource.Name: Titanbane Myco Husk
Resource.Description: [RESOURCE]Titanbane Myco Husk[/RESOURCE] Fungal husks gathered from titanbane groves fortify legion armor while researchers decode their anti-bioweapon secrets.

Resource.Name: Starforge Obsidian Pillars
Resource.Description: [RESOURCE]Starforge Obsidian Pillars[/RESOURCE] Obsidian pillars grown within solar furnaces that brace megacities against orbital shear.

Resource.Name: Leyglow Aragonite
Resource.Description: [RESOURCE]Leyglow Aragonite[/RESOURCE] Iridescent aragonite clusters that absorb geomantic shocks and keep skyscraper districts level.

Resource.Name: Phoenixcrest Saffron
Resource.Description: [RESOURCE]Phoenixcrest Saffron[/RESOURCE] Saffron strands plucked from phoenixcrest lilies; imperial chefs bid entire treasuries for a handful.

Resource.Name: Starreef Truffle Coral
Resource.Description: [RESOURCE]Starreef Truffle Coral[/RESOURCE] Reef coral that buds truffle-like pearls coveted by gourmand sects across the spiral.

Resource.Name: Sunwell Terraced Grain
Resource.Description: [RESOURCE]Sunwell Terraced Grain[/RESOURCE] Terraced grain bathed in mirrored suns that sustains explosive settlement booms.

Resource.Name: Cradlewyrm Bone Marrow
Resource.Description: [RESOURCE]Cradlewyrm Bone Marrow[/RESOURCE] Gentle cradlewyrms yield nutrient-rich marrow distilled into tonics for overburdened colonies.

Resource.Name: Jade Serenade Resin
Resource.Description: [RESOURCE]Jade Serenade Resin[/RESOURCE] Aromatic resin that burns with jade-blue fire and blankets public plazas in tranquil harmonics.

Resource.Name: Starlit Opera Pearls
Resource.Description: [RESOURCE]Starlit Opera Pearls[/RESOURCE] Pearls that hum ancient operas when warmed, enchanting festival crowds with shared nostalgia.

Resource.Name: Stormglass Leviathan Scales
Resource.Description: [RESOURCE]Stormglass Leviathan Scales[/RESOURCE] Scales flensed from stormglass leviathans and inlaid into hulls to accelerate shield regeneration.

Resource.Name: Dragonbone Ward Shards
Resource.Description: [RESOURCE]Dragonbone Ward Shards[/RESOURCE] Runic dragonbone shards radiate martial wards while scholars decode the battle doctrine etched within.

Resource.Name: Celestine Anchor Monoliths
Resource.Description: [RESOURCE]Celestine Anchor Monoliths[/RESOURCE] Towering celestine monoliths that lock megacities into synchronous orbit-stabilized formations.

Resource.Name: Chronotwine Elderwood
Resource.Description: [RESOURCE]Chronotwine Elderwood[/RESOURCE] Elderwood vines that twist through time seams to knit entire districts against tectonic drift.

Resource.Name: Sunsilk Tribute Pelts
Resource.Description: [RESOURCE]Sunsilk Tribute Pelts[/RESOURCE] Radiant pelts shed by sunsilk vulpines and traded as ceremonial tributes at staggering premiums.

Resource.Name: Voidcurrant Amberwine
Resource.Description: [RESOURCE]Voidcurrant Amberwine[/RESOURCE] Amberwine fermented from vacuum-grown berries; monks guard each vintage like a treasury bond.

Resource.Name: Eonheart Seedstones
Resource.Description: [RESOURCE]Eonheart Seedstones[/RESOURCE] Seedstones that pulse with ancient heartbeats, planted beneath nurseries to hasten communal recovery.

Resource.Name: Heavenfeast Leviathan Roe
Resource.Description: [RESOURCE]Heavenfeast Leviathan Roe[/RESOURCE] Luminescent roe from heavenfeast leviathans reserved for colonies racing through expansion.

Resource.Name: Aurora Dream Incense
Resource.Description: [RESOURCE]Aurora Dream Incense[/RESOURCE] Incense cones that project auroral visions overhead and dissolve civic unrest into awe.

Resource.Name: Laughing Moon Petrogems
Resource.Description: [RESOURCE]Laughing Moon Petrogems[/RESOURCE] Petrogems that ring with silvery laughter when struck, sealing reconciliation ceremonies with joy.

Resource.Name: Chronosea Leviathan Tendons
Resource.Description: [RESOURCE]Chronosea Leviathan Tendons[/RESOURCE] Elastic tendons that retain chronosea momentum; engineers braid them into engines for blitz-speed sorties.

Resource.Name: War-Oracle Obsidian Eyes
Resource.Description: [RESOURCE]War-Oracle Obsidian Eyes[/RESOURCE] Obsidian eye-stones carved from war-oracle statues enlighten generals while advancing psychic warfare studies.

Resource.Name: Empyreal Mandala Geode
Resource.Description: [RESOURCE]Empyreal Mandala Geode[/RESOURCE] Mandala-shaped geodes cracked open to reveal harmonic crystals that uplift infrastructure, scholarship, and trade.

Resource.Name: Phoenixheart Dawn Nectar
Resource.Description: [RESOURCE]Phoenixheart Dawn Nectar[/RESOURCE] Nectar gathered at sunrise from phoenixheart blossoms; a single draught sparks civic zeal and flourishing families.

Resource.Name: Starwyrm Aurora Heart
Resource.Description: [RESOURCE]Starwyrm Aurora Heart[/RESOURCE] Crystalline starwyrm hearts pulse with aurora fire, syncing fleets and legions into ferocious harmony.

Resource.Name: Chronotidal Empyrean Pearl
Resource.Description: [RESOURCE]Chronotidal Empyrean Pearl[/RESOURCE] Pearls grown where time tides meet let merchants sense profitable futures and diplomats read the room.

Resource.Name: Eclipsepetal Lotus Crown
Resource.Description: [RESOURCE]Eclipsepetal Lotus Crown[/RESOURCE] Lotus crowns that bloom only during eclipses, weaving ancient schematics into urban hearts while enthralling citizens.

Resource.Name: Dragonwhorl Tempest Scale
Resource.Description: [RESOURCE]Dragonwhorl Tempest Scale[/RESOURCE] Tempest scales shed by dragonwhorl leviathans mid-storm supercharge admiralty cores and fleet responses.

Resource.Name: Karmic Aurora Veil
Resource.Description: [RESOURCE]Karmic Aurora Veil[/RESOURCE] Veils spun from auroral silk filter karmic smog, brighten populations, and make every negotiation gleam.

Resource.Name: Voidjade Oracle Husk
Resource.Description: [RESOURCE]Voidjade Oracle Husk[/RESOURCE] Fossilized voidjade oracle husks sharpen allied clairvoyance while confounding rival agents.

Resource.Name: Heaven's Ember Lychee
Resource.Description: [RESOURCE]Heaven's Ember Lychee[/RESOURCE] Lychee ripened within volcano monasteries kindle fertile booms, eager recruits, and rapid civic expansion.

Resource.Name: Daoheart Ocean Pearl
Resource.Description: [RESOURCE]Daoheart Ocean Pearl[/RESOURCE] Ocean pearls grown around daoheart currents bankroll research foundries and interstellar trade hubs alike.
